ALDLS.PA.summary: DLSI provides employment solutions in France, Switzerland, Luxembourg, Germany, and Poland. It offers services in the areas of indefinite-term to fixed-term contracts, and temporary employment services. The company collaborates with companies in various sectors, such as building, nuclear, electricity, accounting, maintenance, and others. It offers its services under the DLSI, PEMSA, and TERCIO brands. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Forbach, France.

ALFRE.PA.summary: Freelance.com SA provides intermediation between companies and intellectual providers in France, Germany, Britain, Morocco, Switzerland, and Singapore. It offers outsourcing managing, talent acquisition and umbrella company arrangement, and verifying service provider compliance services. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

ALMAR.PA.summary: Mare Nostrum SociÃ©tÃ© anonyme provides human resources management services to SMEs in France and internationally. It offers temporary employment, recruitment consultancy, training, and wage portage and professional mobility services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Grenoble, France.

CEN.PA.summary: Groupe CRIT SA provides temporary staffing and recruitment services to the small and medium-sized businesses and industries in France, the United States, the United Kingdom, Spain, Portugal, Africa, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Temporary Staffing and Recruitment, Airport Services, and Other Services. The company offers services for recruitment; job placement; consulting; HR management digitization; and first-time employment support, including support and advice to job seekers, redeployment and retraining for workers made redundant, engineering consulting for finding employment for recent graduates, employment support and advice for disabled workers, audits and advice for companies, etc. It also provides airport services, such as check-in, boarding, and ticketing; aircraft assistance services consisting of towing, parking, chocking, electrical connections, baggage and cargo handling, checking tanks, cleaning, and aircraft pushouts; traffic services comprising monitoring flight plans, drawing up weight and balance forms, weather monitoring, etc.; and cargo services that include transfer of cargo and mail from runway and storage. In addition, the company offers engineering and industrial maintenance, and hospitality and training services. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

CT2.SG.summary: Groupe CRIT SA provides temporary staffing and recruitment services to the small and medium-sized businesses and industries in France, the United States, the United Kingdom, Spain, Portugal, Africa, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Temporary Staffing and Recruitment, Airport Services, and Other Services. The company offers services for recruitment; job placement; consulting; HR management digitization; and first-time employment support, including support and advice to job seekers, redeployment and retraining for workers made redundant, engineering consulting for finding employment for recent graduates, employment support and advice for disabled workers, audits and advice for companies, etc. It also provides airport services, such as check-in, boarding, and ticketing; aircraft assistance services consisting of towing, parking, chocking, electrical connections, baggage and cargo handling, checking tanks, cleaning, and aircraft pushouts; traffic services comprising monitoring flight plans, drawing up weight and balance forms, weather monitoring, etc.; and cargo services that include transfer of cargo and mail from runway and storage. In addition, the company offers engineering and industrial maintenance, and hospitality and training services. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

MLGEL.PA.summary: Gel Groupe SA offers recruitment and staffing services for the logistics sector. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Saint Andre De Corcy, France.

MLUMG.PA.summary: Umalis Group provides wage portage services for consultants working in the various fields of IT sector and new technologies in France and internationally. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Paris, France.

SDG.PA.summary: Synergie SE provides human resources management and development services for companies and institutions in Europe, Canada, Australia, and China. It offers temporary employment, recruitment, out-placement, social engineering, consultancy, and training services. The company serves various specialized tertiary sectors and industries, such as aeronautics and renewable energy, construction and public works, retail, information technology and IT services, and communications. Synergie SE operates through a network of 750 agencies. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

It offers temporary employment, recruitment, out-placement, social engineering, consultancy, and training services. The company serves various specialized tertiary sectors and industries, such as aeronautics and renewable energy, construction and public works, retail, information technology and IT services, and communications. Synergie SE operates through a network of 750 agencies. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
